contentrichtext.text: '''[[Anton Chekhov]]''' (1860â€“1904) was a Russian physician, dramatist and writer. '''Chekhov'''/'''Chekov''' (masculine) or '''Chekhova''' (feminine) may also refer to: {{TOC right}} ==Places== *[[Chekhov (inhabited locality)]], several inhabited localities in Russia *[[Chekov (crater)]], crater on Mercury ==Other uses== *[[Chekhov (surname)]] (''Chekhova'', ''Chekov'') *[[2369 Chekhov]], an asteroid *[[Vityaz Chekhov]], a Russian professional ice hockey team *[[Chekhov Gymnasium]], school, and now museum in Taganrog *[[Chekhov Library]], public library in Taganrog *[[Anton Chekhov class motorship]] ==See also== *[[Commodity checkoff program]], an organization that collects funds from producers of a particular agricultural commodity *[[Chekhovo]] *[[Chekhovsky (disambiguation)]] {{Disambiguation|geo}}
